IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT PROCEDURES FOR OPENING A NEW ACCOUNT

To help the government fight the funding of terrorism and money laundering activities, federal law requires all financial institutions to obtain, verify, and record information that identifies each person who opens an account. What this means for you: When you open an account, we will ask for your name, address, date of birth, and other information that will allow us to identify you. We may also ask to see your driver\'s license or other identifying documents

Please fill in all details as required

The Divinity Group Family of Services is a Christian based company offering individuals located in the Greater Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky/Southeastern Indiana community a full range of financial and insurance products, as well as partnering with on-site CPAs and Attorneys to be able to provide you with tax and legal services. Our clients benefit from our multiple areas of expertise and appreciate our holistic approach.

Everyone knows that having all of your eggs in one basket in terms of investments is a bad idea, but having all of the experienced professionals you need to manage all of the financial aspects of your life in one place is a great idea and provides you with incredible convenience and stronger relationships with all of your trusted advisors!

The experts and heads of each division of the Divinity Group Family of Services, as well as each associate, believe that tax strategies, retirement planning, and estate conservation should be top priorities for individuals and families of all ages and income ranges. While providing you with the best advice for your particular circumstance, we adhere to Christian principles, rather than just what is acceptable ethics for our industry - giving you additional peace of mind.

Because many people regard financial strategies as complex and confusing, they often miss out on many potentially rewarding financial opportunities. People take on unnecessary financial risks and fail to adequately protect their assets. Many people don\'t think that they need basic estate planning documents or planning, when simple steps taken now save valuable time and money later.

That\'s where we can help. Our goal is to take the mystery out of investing (through Lincoln Financial Securities), managing risk, preparing for retirement, and preserving your wealth. The Divinity Group Family of Services is set up with the experience of several specialized firms under one roof to help you acquire the information you need to pursue your financial objectives. While doing so, we hope to establish a long and trusted relationship with you.
